name: SportsHD Dark Minimalist
description: Removes the chat box, and darkens everything. On 1280 width and less monitors, the video stretches to the edges of the screen.
additional_info: I created this because I wanted the look of full screen without losing the ability to have easy access my multi-monitor taskbar (DisplayFusion) which disappears otherwise if set to true fullscreen. Since the chat box is blocked on most adblockers, this removes that as well.
